description.name: HitPay Payment Gateway
description.long: HitPay Payment Gateway Plugin allows merchants to accept PayNow QR, Cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, WeChatPay, AliPay and GrabPay Payments.
features: With HitPay Payment Gateway, customers can quickly checkout and complete orders with their preferred payment method
Pay only per transaction. No monthly, setup, admin or any hidden service fees
